remarks: A variant of the Axiom of Power Sets ~ ax-pow .  For any set ` x ` , there exists a set ` y ` whose members are exactly the subsets of ` x ` i.e. the power set of ` x ` .  Axiom Pow of [BellMachover] p. 466. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-2006.)
statement:
axpow3 $p |- E. y A. z ( z C_ x <-> z e. y ) $.
$d x y z $.
